sentence.Network_en: Coleridge was to spend the next thirty years attacking rationalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯尔律治在之后的30年里一直抨击理性主义。

sentence.Network_en: As a child, Coleridge developed omnivorous reading habits.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯尔律治从孩提时期便养成了广泛阅读的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: Coleridge was also a highly unstable person.
sentence.Network_cn: 科尔里奇还是个情绪非常不稳定的人。
